requirements.cpu_arch: Linux x86-64, ARM 32/64, IBM POWER8, x86/i686

services.name: mattermost-server
services.description_en: Browser access to mattermost Document by http

faqs.question_cn: Mattermost 容器环境变量中的 MM_SQLSETTINGS_DATASOURCE 是必要的吗？
faqs.answer_cn: 是的，否则容器无法连接 MySQL
faqs.question_en: Is the item MM_SQLSETTINGS_DATASOURCE need for Mattermost container?
faqs.answer_en: Yes, otherwise Mattermost can't connect MySQL
